about_the_game:
Goobis Dimension is a puzzle-platformer that takes players on a journey through a quirky, dimensional world. The key to success is teamwork, players must stick together with their buddy to overcome challenges, solve puzzles, and navigate the ever-shifting environments. Master the art of cooperation as you combine abilities and explore a strange, interconnected universe.

Features:

  • Buddy up! Grab a friend and explore the whimsical world of Goobis Dimension together in a warm, cooperative adventure!

  • Goobi´s Dimension features a beautiful hand-drawn art style that harks back to the 16-bit era, while using modern technology to add that extra cozy oomph!

  • Separate or stick together! Climb or fall on top of each other! We all know that two playable characters are better than one!

  • This world doesn’t make any sense! And that’s the best part! The focus is on interesting and fun level design, perfectly tied to the game’s core mechanics.

  • Adorable characters and quirky enemies!

  • No stress! Enjoy a super-chill, lofi-inspired soundtrack that helps you relax while solving puzzles.

  • A playful, simple narrative filled with humor and a touch of heart.

  • Explore a dimensional overworld as you travel between interconnected worlds!

name: Goobi's Dimension

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-2500 3.3GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTS450 / AMD Radeon 6850HD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: controller is recommended to play this game.

short_description: Goobi´s Dimension is a puzzle platformer where you explore a dimensional world by sticking together with your buddy
